revised_title: Clarification on Archdeacon Pratt's Paper: Local Attraction in the English Arc
tldr: Captain A.R. Clarke analyzes Archdeacon Pratt's paper on the effect of local attraction in the English Arc and provides corrections to the values of E and A for the arcs. He also discusses the deflections at various stations and the system of quantities obtained when using the English arc in the determination of the figure of the earth.
